# MDX Nested Test

Testing nested JSX structures in MDX.

export const data = {
  users: [
    { name: 'Alice', age: 30 },
    { name: 'Bob', age: 25 },
    { name: 'Charlie', age: 35 }
  ]
};

<div class="users">
  {data.users.map(user => (
    <div class="user-card">
      <h3>{user.name}</h3>
      <p>Age: {user.age}</p>
    </div>
  ))}
</div>

## Nested Lists

<div class="nested">
  <ul>
    {[1, 2, 3].map(i => (
      <li>
        Item {i}
        <ul>
          {['a', 'b'].map(letter => <li>{i}{letter}</li>)}
        </ul>
      </li>
    ))}
  </ul>
</div>
